author: edson.eth
content: Probably, either add headers, or convert to unordered lists. Tables don't really make sense if there's no identifier for the columns, might as well be a list with colons.

author: sky.cactus
content: My concern with that is that it binds the EIPs site to being rendered in places/ways that can render both MD and HTML.

author: sky.cactus
content: Right now you can render EIPs anywhere that you can render MD, which includes text editors to some extent since MD is easily human readable as plain text while HTML is not.

author: sky.cactus
content: Not a horrible solution.  I do like the table formatting a bit better, but maybe it isn't worth it.
